'''Jueyun Chili Chicken''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Jueyun Chili Chicken is obtainable from [[Chef Mao]] at [[Wanmin Restaurant]] for 2,500 [[Mora]] after reaching [[Adventure Rank]] 20.

Depending on the quality, Jueyun Chili Chicken increases the party's critical rate by '''6'''/'''9'''/'''12'''% for 300 seconds. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].

{{Special Dish|Xinyan|Rockin' Riffin' Chicken!}}
